slides.title: Feature Engineering
slides.content:
# Time Series Features ğŸ”§

## Lag Features

- Previous values as features
- y(t-1), y(t-2), ...

## Window Features

- Rolling mean/std
- Min/max in window

## Date Features

- Day of week
- Month, quarter
- Holidays

| Feature Type | Example |
|--------------|--------|
| Lag | Previous day sales |
| Rolling | 7-day average |
| Calendar | Is weekend? |
